  • Constructor Details

    • PersonalBoard

      public PersonalBoard()
      Class constructor. Instantiates a new Personal Board. It instantiates a new Warehouse depot, a new Special depot, a new temporary depot, a new strongbox, a new personal development board, a new in hand leader card, a new list of production power.

    • getAllResourceCount

      public int getAllResourceCount()
      Get the count of all the resources, stored inside the depots, regardless of the type. Used at the end of the game to calculate the victory points.
      Returns:
      the int
